## Price interface

Price information for a product.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare interface Price 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [amount](./purchases-js.price.amount.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number | Price in full units of the currency. |
|  [currency](./purchases-js.price.currency.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string | Returns ISO 4217 currency code for price. For example, if price is specified in British pounds sterling, currency is "GBP". If currency code cannot be determined, currency symbol is returned. |
